alert.note: Alert for Becker; Mahnomen; Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 24 at 3:23PM CDT until June 24 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Norman County in northwestern Minnesota... Southwestern Mahnomen County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Becker County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 323 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located 8 miles east of Ulen, or 19 miles northwest of Detroit Lakes, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Waubun, Flom and Ogema. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
